website_summaries.verdict: Stylish red retro finish makes this ice machine stand out. The 2 pounds of ice it holds at any given time makes it outstanding.
pros: This Igloo is great example of style meeting functionality
But it also has a 3-quart water reservoir that means you won’t need to constantly refill
What’s more, it can make up to an impressive 26 pounds of ice in a 24-hour period
cons: It tends to be somewhat louder than some of its competitors during the ice-making process

customer_reviews.title: Happy Ice Cruncher!!
customer_reviews.text: I love ice, so much that I keep running our fridge ice maker out. My hubby got me this and I am in heaven! I was buying bags of sonic ice, still love it. Now my hubby has my ice making for me on my way home because this is more than just ice. It makes the best eating ice. Easy to crunch and it makes me oh so happy. Simple things in life make me so happy. Love this ice maker. It starts making ice in about 6 min it makes its first dump. Then every 6 to 8 minutes another and another. Keeps me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dean

customer_reviews.title: Amazon won’t support defective products on first request
customer_reviews.text: Item unfortunately didn’t work out of the box after following set up procedure. Tried to return/exchange with Amazon, followed recommended path to talk to expert 1st, but after asking about the plug and any damage, then say they refuse to accept return and pointed me to manufacturer. Now I have to track this down without any support from Amazon. Update: after calling the igloo, then their manufacturer, I was pointed back to Amazon to do an exchange. Amazon eventually agreed after wasting a day and multiple calls. After months with the replacement, we love the ice maker. We run it daily. Changing my review from 1star to 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Gpa J

customer_reviews.title: Love my Igloo!
customer_reviews.text: I am an all day ice muncher, it was how I got off sodas cold turkey, but my regular ice maker in fridge could not keep up. With the igloo, it makes a full basket in about 40 minutes (enough time to binge a streaming tv episode). Three baskets fill up my depleted ice maker bucket. When I hit the crushed ice button the pieces are not hard to bite through and they my for great Frappuccinos
customer_reviews.author: SockMonkey777

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why other people are complaining about this ice maker....it works great. I've made 20lbs of large ice and no complaints from me. The ice will stick together when you put it in the freezer but it breaks apart easily. I put them in a plastic bowl for a little while then shake it until they break apart then put them in a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Troy E.

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine for camping when I have electric. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for camping when I have electric. Now I use it in my kitchen a few days before a party. The ice maker in my fridge broke and it is more convenient than running out to buy ice all the time and less costly than a new fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Straley, Author, Alzheimer's Trippin' with George

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and smooth operating ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Love my new ice maker. It is the perfect size and fits under my cabinets - not too big and bulky like my previous one. It runs smoothly and quietly as well, which is a huge plus and it also looks stylish. I ran a quick errand and by the time I got home, it was filled with ice. Very happy with my new ice maker. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne Van Rens

customer_reviews.title: Fail!! Read carefully before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a birthday gift and worked fine for the first day or two. After that the ice gets caught while being fed into the tray, causing the sensors to believe the basket is full and stops making ice, when in fact it may have half a dozen at most cubes sitting in the tray. Very bad design
customer_reviews.author: Nibbler666

customer_reviews.title: Does not work right
customer_reviews.text: Only 6 out of nine cubes are made. will not cut off when full.I don't recommend this product,
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: Best little ice maker, quiet and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ice maker. I’m one of those people who needs ice in anything I drink. This ice maker is used in our camper and it works great. I use bottled water (campgrounds don’t always have the best water) in it. I was amazed just how quickly it does make ice. Bag up the extra ice for later.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Slowly produces small cubes
customer_reviews.text: Slowly produces very small ice cubes cubes even if "large" is selected. Good for one or two people who need some ice for individual drinks. If you need ice for a group, start the machine a few hours in advance.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use / price/ design and appearance great deal$$$
customer_reviews.text: It works great for personal use using filtered water makes for clean pure ice live in a senior low income apt complex that has a “ community “upright two door with a ice / water built in dispenser that has broken many times already seeing people reaching in with their unwashed hands (having a personal clean ice. Surprisingly easy to use and maintain (just add water) the auto interrupt system with warning LEDs .
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Smells like electric burning!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 of these, they seem to last a year. But, I have always been satisfied with that. The one got today smells like electrical burning. It's also much louder than the other ones, which doesn't matter to me. Just worried about the burning electrical smell. Would give it 5 stars but this smell is making me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Ice Maker, Does not make even ice, always over filling, sensors do not work.
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker has been giving me problems since day 1, I allowed it over an hour to set and have the coolant go level, and it just doesn't make good ice, it usually is uneven, some are small some large, and it always over fills and keeps filling, to the point where it almost pops the lid off, the sensors do not work, I wish I had bought another brand. EDIT:DOES NOT WORK, WORST ICE MAKER EVER, DO NOT BUY THIS! AVOID AT ALL COST.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I wish we had bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: After two refrigerators have flooded my kitchen, I swore I would never have a permanent hooked up ice maker We have a fridge with no water and no icemaker, and then hubby gets us yetis for Christmas, and the wanting of ice was now back, so we looked at many ice makers, we also travel with our travel trailer and thought this is a win win and it is! It makes more ice than we could ever use, we make a lot of ice and keep it in a bucket in the freezer and when we see it is getting low plug it up and make some more! Awesome little unit!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste to ice
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use and understand, but our ice still tastes like plastic. We have washed it, rinsed it, and drained numerous times, and it still tastes like plastic. I thought maybe it just had to run and cycle through for a minute, but we’ve had it almost a month, and there’s still that taste with our ice. Update: after some time that taste seems to have gone away. Ice tastes great, holds up well, and produces so much ice !!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY !!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for only five months now as of today November 12, 2019. It has now completely stopped making ice. It would cost me just as much to have it repaired as it cost me to purchase it. The problem started two weeks ago and it has NOT worked as it should since then. If anyone is into large paperweights this would be the perfect item. Sadly disappointed with this particular purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David8846

customer_reviews.title: Makes great ice and hypnotizes 5 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: The ice is great! We use filtered water from our ZeroWater pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! I purchased this for the camper. I fill it and then it on...then I can go boating for 2 hrs. I do transfer each basket of ice into the freezer in the camper. Perfect for our needs when the grandkids are with us
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wildeman

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker
customer_reviews.text: My best appliance ever. I am an ice eater and I love thus ice maker. A great person sponsored the funds as a gift for me to buy something and we purchased this ice maker. I had family come over and they fell in love with it. It’s easy to use, I love the size of the ice pieces and it doesn’t take up too much space on my kitchen countertop. A great ice maker and I’m glad I purchased this brand from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good ice maker but doesn't always shut off when full - jams up.
customer_reviews.text: We returned one of these because the ice full function did not always work and ice maker kept jamming up. Only worked maybe half the time and then jammed up. Got the new ice maker and it also has the same problem, didn't bother sending the second one back. Wondering if they had a problem at the factory with a batch they shipped out?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Minor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this amazing machine! Ice is made quickly. You know when it's running but not overly loud. Super simple to use. I would definitely recommend this ice maker not only for it's efficiency but also it's good looks and compact design
customer_reviews.author: G. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work.  Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it, but tried three times and after making ice for about an hour, the machine stopped working and turned itself off. A pity.
customer_reviews.author: S. Soule

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Maker - fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the long delay in getting a replacement ice-maker for my refrigerator and after a month (delay due to Coronavirus pandemic). Amazed at how easy it is to set up and use, and I can get great tasting ice much faster than via my fridge ice maker - now I am wondering if I should just use this all of the time?
customer_reviews.author: MRI Queen

customer_reviews.title: Don't just turn it on and leave the house. You should keep an eye on it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Igloo, which sits on the kitchen counter. I make a couple gallon size bags of ice each day, so convenient and cheaper than getting the ice maker fixed on the fridge. Or running to the store all the time for a $4.00 bash of ice. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Drury

customer_reviews.title: Check ice dump before you send back
customer_reviews.text: So when I received this ice maker I was excited... until I started using it. It was fast and did what it was supposed to do however. I found a flaw in how it was put together. After messing with it for a few hours and watching it get stuck and not dropping all the ice out I decided to pull two pins and take off the (ramp if you will ). Wow it made better thicker ice and everything dropped like it was supposed to. So I played with the ramp and found that it was installed backwards. I put it on how it should’ve been and now works flawlessly!! The picture is the way it’s supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis bennett

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, works okay, but LOUD and ice melts right away
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy. It is cute and looks great. Small and easy to make room for. But it is LOUD. Other people said it was "quite". Maybe I just have all my hearing...either way, it is super loud. Also ice melts right away, big glob of stuck drippy ice unless you babysit the machine and sit right next to it waiting for the ice to drop. Not worth the headache. Bummer too. Liked the design look.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Portable Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this ice maker for a week, and we love it! It is not a freezer so it is important to understand that the ice once made will melt back into the reservoir if not used. I usually bag our ice and place in the freezer. This was a great purchase for our lifestyle, home, patio, camping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess T

customer_reviews.title: this works great
customer_reviews.text: its not as noisy as i expected (in fact its pretty quiet) works great, easy to use, and makes a lot of ice cubes in a short time. i would buy it again or recommend it to a friend. very good product that's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty and broken.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived defective. I happened to have a professional contractor at my house and he looked at it then tried to fix the mechanical tray but said it was installed incorrectly. More quality control is needed on this product. Not a good experience when something arrives completely non functional. Doesn’t happen often on Amazon. Purchased a Deco instead.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I only had the machine for 2 months and it already broke. The water pump started making a grinding noise and smelled like it was burning. Igloo is replacing it for us. Hopefully the next one last longer than 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable and short lived
customer_reviews.text: I had to have the first one I got replaced in under 30 days. Now at 5 months the replacement has stopped working correctly. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Icemaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little icemaker. Easy to use, makes small and large cubes quickly. We used it over the weekend in our RV and are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Henning

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice maker,  quiet, fast and love the shape!
customer_reviews.text: I rented a apartment that has a refrigerator but no icemaker, so I purchased this Igloo icemaker and it was a great buy! Makes great ice, quickly, and love the small round shape, and is a quiet machine! I haven't experienced any problems at all with it, I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sweety

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Someone asked if the ice was clear...I use distilled water and the ice is clear. So its probably what minerals/infiltrates your water has that determines the clarity of the cubes. Its quiet, works wonderfully and we have continuous ice! SOOO happy we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Auqtu

customer_reviews.title: This little appliance is gold!
customer_reviews.text: We love this icemaker. It makes ice like a champ for us on our sailboat. We start it about 15-30 minutes before we are ready for a drink or if we want to put ice in our little air coolers. It makes us happy every time we hear the ice dump into the little basket. No more using gross ice from the cooler or constantly having to buy bags of ice just for our drinks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chacha1077

customer_reviews.title: Ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! We ran our first cycle through and couldn't be any more pleased. Easy instructions, fast ice making, 🧊 👌.. we like the design and color red. Fits good on our counter top beside fridge. Good product and value.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Loved this machine, makes ice cubes quickly and is quiet
customer_reviews.author: rondi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great (about 1 week in)! The ice is made reasonably fast. There is some noise but it's not overbearing, just a typical ice machine hum. The only downside is that it's not well insulated so it's best to empty the tray as soon as possible after it is full. Otherwise, it just melts back down into the water. Other than that it's a great product and I hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cute cubes
customer_reviews.text: Works ok...only issue I have is that the ice cubes melt really fast in the beginning until more cubes fall.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  No more sacrificing ice to make room in the freezer!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant, now I wonder why I waited. This is an amazing little machine and I'm glad I didn't listen to the negative reviews. Very easy to use and within a couple of hours I had all the ice I could possibly use in one night. The noise is similar to, but quieter than a white noise machine and is a non-issue for me, but you can hear the fan. If they ever do try to improve it they should put some sort of a holder for the scoop on the outside of it but beyond that I can't think of anything I am not happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck H

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the real problem here is that it can't keep itself cold enough to keep ice from melting, so you have to stand by to either use it right away, or to transfer it regularly into a freezer. Other than that, it does the job. Easy to fill, it works about at the speed advertised, and gives you an easy way to get ice in a quicker period of time than a fridge / freezer normally does. Color really pops as well. The red is deep.
customer_reviews.author: LegoDadTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Keep check on water level.
customer_reviews.text: My Igloo ice maker is super! I love it. Add water to the water line, and let it do its job. 9 ice cubes times ,3 drops of ice into the basket,time to empty the bucket, ( about 7 minutes). add water back to fill line, and there it goes making ice cubes! Fun to watch! Sure beats having to keep buying bags of ice! I fill the ice bin in the freezer, then make spare bags of ice cubes to use. A little noisey, but not to the point of irritation! At least, I know it is working and doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: sarah williams

customer_reviews.title: Ice ice baby!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I highly recommend it. We have had it a few months now and it’s works flawlessly. We use it everyday in our house and it keeps up with a family of 3 no problems. It is portable and we take it on camping trip with us. I would buy this product again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet. Quick. Great tasting Ice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to fill the gap of not having a refrigerator with built in ice maker. Makes ice quick and it's quiet while doing it. Ice has a fantastic crunch, and I find myself just getting a cup to chew on. Ice will occasionally block the sensor, but it's only a minor minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised,  but...
customer_reviews.text: I works well and makes ice as advertised. The unit is large and cumbersome and takes up considerable countertop real estate. I guess this is the tradeoff for good ice quickly? If the weight could be trimmed down a couple of pounds that would be great. I read the specs before ordering but until you pick it up it doesn't register.
customer_reviews.author: Synergy Farmer

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Pro: quiet-no louder than your microwave, makes ice fast- fills up the ice bucket deceptively quick Cons:the bucket isn’t cold enough to keep ice there on its own, so it’s slowly melting while waiting for it to empty. Overall we love it. Been great to use
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This unit is awesome it makes ice for our family really fast! We can turn it on while we are cooking supper and we have ice for everyone by the time we all sit down! It’s also really pretty. The ice ice sizes are perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product  !
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice maker , it makes ice quickly & efficiently . It is very easy to use . WE think it is one of the absolute best things we ever bought ..
customer_reviews.author: Pamela G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I drink way more water and i love that I can put the water in so you can use any type of water you love and trust. Heck of a deal
customer_reviews.author: fsandy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Shutting Off and Says to Add Water
customer_reviews.text: I was initially happy with this purchase, but after a couple of weeks it stopped making ice and the indicator light would come on stating to add water when it was already full. This keeps happening and I have to keep turning it on and off over and over until it eventually starts making ice again. So annoying, do NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kasia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after having in for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT 😁 Works great, I love it. Update: Aug. 2020. 4 months after I brought it now it doesn't work. When I turn it on it starts then says empty water but it's full of water. I can only assume the water sensor went bad. In 4 months???? Doesn't seem right to me, should have lasted a lot longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works okay for now.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Makes two sizes of ice. The ice is made quickly. The big problem is that after two of three ice making cycles the ice don’t slide down to basket and backs up. The smallest piece of ice triggers basket full sensor. This backup creates only enough ice for one or two cups of ice. I constantly push ice into basket for ice to continue to be made. I wouldn’t buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: brian skinner

customer_reviews.title: Portable.  Trustworthy.  Just AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome ice maker. What? Portable? I can put this on my service cart and roll this into my livingroom? LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Not cool
customer_reviews.text: Well for the first four months I loved it. Quiet enough. Loved the ice ... however it has quit working, like the cooling element no longer works. Disappointing. I have purchased two more for my parents and in laws and hopefully they will have better luck. To be continued ....
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental
customer_reviews.text: This machine has two ice size settings But only creates one size. After running for awhile the machine forgets to drop the ice cubes and freezes into a giant mass. Occasionally it forgets to start freezing. Other times it just flashes all the lites like it went on strike.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe Family

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this tabletop ice maker. It makes ice really fast. Put water in the base, turn it on and you will have ice in just a few minutes! It stops automatically when the basket is full or when it runs out of water. We received ours just in time for a 2 week camping trip. We loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Reading maestra

customer_reviews.title: At end of day, sent back.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked: product design What I did not like: wired round shape of ice and worse, cloudy color.
customer_reviews.author: Deyna V.

customer_reviews.title: Screeching noise
customer_reviews.text: I have had this ice machine for 10 months. About 2 months ago it started making this unbearable screeching noise whenever it is starts new round of ice. Noise last for about 2 minutes. Just threw the machine away. Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Beth Z

customer_reviews.title: It’s noisy
customer_reviews.text: Ice is good. Makes cubes quickly. We use it because our refrigerator does not have an ice maker. Because the noise level is pretty high, we only use it when we need to stock up on ice
customer_reviews.author: Paul Umble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our home. Easy set up and works well.
customer_reviews.author: S L Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Order received was oil covered. Igloo customer support was non existant. Returned to Amazon and quickly received a replacement. At this point I am pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this ice maker if you are considering purchasing one. Super simple to use, makes a good amount of ice with just one fill. Go for it, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Cowlan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in, add water, press the on/power button, choose the size of ice cube and voila! if you use cold water, you get better ice cubes faster. sometimes the first batch was a waste because it was just too hot in my kitchen this past month. But I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine. Perfect for a small family or keeping your freezer full. If you are having a party stock up. If your looking for a commercial machine you need something else but this is the perfect personal machine.
customer_reviews.author: C. mallon

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: We love our igloo! Fast with cubes and we are figuring things out....like start the day before for lots of ice. A little wet when they go in the big freezer but I just smash them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Maker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This unit can make ice in 7 minutes. 2 sizes of ice too. Large and small that can fit into a water bottle. Best appliance ever, and come in many colors. Get one, you'll love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Parker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product & well worth buying, love the look of it & how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: POETT46

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My refrigerator icemaker broke, it was around $500 to replace so we bought this instead. It honestly does not take long to fill up my ice bin in my refrigerator. The only downfall that I can come up with is the ice gets a little wet because inside the icemaker doesn’t stay completely cold! But not a Biggy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice machine.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice machine. Very easy to use and makes ice so quickly. Nice addition to my Kitchen. If you like ice in your drinks this it.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Ice cube perfection
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is fantastic! It makes ice quickly and the cubes are just right, not too hard and crunchy, not too soft and mushy. Perfect. We run it 24/7 basically and it's holding up great. Have had it for 6 months. It was a great purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Ice from home
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice quickly & very efficient! Great for cooling drinks in summer & no need to buy bags of ice!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: For less than $100 this thing is perfect! I’m constantly making ice becuz we don’t have an ice maker and I haven’t had an issue one! And it’s so cute! I got the red one...😊
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Powers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Having ice made with filtered or spring water is so important to me. This ice maker works quickly, makes good quality ice and is not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, dead on arrival - BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The ice machine had a defective full ice sensor right off the bat. I was worried about getting a defective unit. It seems as though these ice machines are notorious for bad sensors. Save your money and spend a few extra bucks on a better quality ice machine. The vendor selling them is extremely unresponsive also, which doesn't help the situation. No response from them for over a week. Buyer beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Davoyan

customer_reviews.title: never worked out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to say much given that never worked upon arrival ... instructions were limited but tried everything they suggested.... believe it was an electronic issue ... returned it and bought another brand ... it has worked great so far and very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: My second machine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It's been running nonstop since I got it. My wife wants ice constantly. Lots of ice. Our freezer is tiny. No more buying bags of ice at the store. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, makes ice wonderful, I'm so pleased with igoo so easy to use and maintain. Great for all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Mine did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I requested a refund because my Igloo Ice Maker did not work at all. The idea is great and that is why I tried it, but sadly, the device did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my freezer was not producing enough ice? This works great! It produces enough ice in a couple of hours! It’s very quiet. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice in minutes
customer_reviews.text: We have a big family, so when it’s summertime, the ice maker on our fridge just doesn’t make enough ice for all of us. This ice maker was a game changer. It makes ice fairly quick. The ice catch is removable and it also comes with a scoop. The only drawback is that the ice melts pretty quickly, so you’ll need to add more ice to your drink if you want it colder.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful icemaker.
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is a workhorse! It produces ice quickly. So no more running to the store to buy heavy bags of ice. Also, all the ice cubes keep their shape, no more unusable "snow" in my ice bin. Can't wait to use it in our travel trailer. And it has already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beardslee

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Appliance is loud when making ice. It does not make ice well. Ice is thin and small even when it is set to large. It does not fill up storage basket. I did not like this product at all. The star rating is deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Apostle Bess

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but the taste...  Still hopeful though!
customer_reviews.text: This little machine works great and puts out ice seriously fast for its size. I’ve made several batches but it does still have a slight plastic taste to it. I’m going to try washing it again to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Means

customer_reviews.title: Fast ice
customer_reviews.text: Makes ice very fast. This is not a freezer but makes ice quickly for gatherings or do like I do and bag it in gallon zip lock bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Burchwell

customer_reviews.title: Ice bin is to small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camper. It does make ice quickly how ever it is not well insulated the stored ice melts and clumps together. Small storage bin does not hold enough ice for more than two people. We check it often emptying the new ice into our freezer to keep up with drinks for 4 people.
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Amaze
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the bar and love always having ice ready now for drinks 😍🙌
customer_reviews.author: trvsjnsn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This was the answers of my prays. You can’t beat this cool guy for ice. Perfect for our travel trailer . Loved it so much bought 2 for Xmas gifts
customer_reviews.author: roberta jones

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine has been with us for a few weeks now. What a Godsend it is!! Easy to use, clean, & travel with. Definitely worth the purchase!! As long as its water in there it will constantly make ice. Also the bright red makes it stand out!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. Ice melts continuously.
customer_reviews.text: The ice storage bin is not well insulated and is only cooled when it is actually making ice. So, the ice is melting continuously. The ice backs up into the chamber where the ice is made so the bin only gets at best half full. The machine is very noisy. You might think something from Igloo would be well insulated but it is not. Because the cubes are small cylinders with a hole through them they melt very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T M OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ice maker!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We dont ever have to worry about ice, and I have 2 people in my family who fill their entire cups with ice every time they get a cup.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I love the price I paid for this item. It is a little slow when trying to build stock but I love it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nice ice maker!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product and makes ice quickly. A little noisier than I thought it would be. Happy with the purchase though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a Christmas gift and the people I got it for just love it. they say its great and makes a lot of ice
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker did an exceptional job making ice efficiency. I even transported the ice maker on several occasions and it had no issues at all. Overall worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Keton Pfeifer

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Ice
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to use this in the travel trailer but when my lovely wife used all the ice in the freezer for canning, I “fired up” this unit and was able to have cold drinks in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 4 weeks with part time use them died.  Useless.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this unit for about 35 days. We bought it for ore vacation cabin so we used it only 2-3 days a week. After 4 weeks it just quit working. Won’t complete the cycle and turns off. Nothing helps and at this stage it is just trash. Apparently we are 3-4 days past out return period. So for $140 or whatever e pain we made a total of 25-39 pounds of ice. Pretty dam expensive ice.
customer_reviews.author: Carla V Lowe

customer_reviews.title: If you like the flavor of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Even after washing it with soap and water there's a plastic flavor. Eliminates any chance of enjoying your beverage
customer_reviews.author: W. Wells

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product as Described
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, listed as #2 out of top 100 ice makers sold. Works as described, quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: 41Buick

customer_reviews.title: Fast  ice making
customer_reviews.text: Love the ice maker, this is the 2nd pone I’ve had. The other lasted 8 years so if this one lasts that long It will be perfect. Fills the basket quickly, looks good on the counter and takes minimal space
customer_reviews.author: Tami Newcom

customer_reviews.title: Wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. It runs daily and pretty much non-stop. Much cheaper than a new refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Igloo ICEB26RR Automatic Portable Electric Countertop Ice Maker Machine, 26 Pounds in 24 Hours, 9 Ice Cubes Ready in 7 minutes, With Ice Scoop and Basket, Perfect for Water Bottles, Mixed Drinks
product_meta.description: Say hello to this perfectly compact, stylish and portable appliance that will keep your beverages nice and chilled! With the ability to make ice in as little as 7 minutes, this unit has the capability to produce 26 pounds of ice per day. A viewing window allows you watch the ice being made, while the 2 pound ice basket ensures plenty of capacity for all of your beverage needs. The LED lighted control panel lets you to choose from small or large ice cube sizes, while also letting you know when to add water and if the ice basket is full. Perfect for pool parties, home bars, dorm rooms, offices and more. Cold Drinks. Warm Smiles.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR CONVENIENCE Portable, convenient and compACt in size, this retro metallic red ice maker looks good on a countertop while producing ice for whenever or wherever you need it
Large ice making capACity keep the water tank filled and this unit will produce 26 pounds of ice in a 24 hour period enough to keep drinks cold all day long
Water tank capACity 3 quarts. Ice production per day (pounds.) - 26
Ice basket capACity stores up to 2 pounds of ice at a time
Quick freezing ice makes 9 small or large cylinder shaped ice cubes in as little as 7 minutes

Control panel simple to understand and illuminated with led lights, the electronic control panel lets you know when you need to add water, when the ice basket is full and allows you to choose the size of the ice cubes
Transparent lid large clear lid allows for easy viewing of ice cube capacity
Removable ice basket ice basket easily removes to transfer ice cubes
Simple serving remove the ice basket to move large quantities of ice, then utilize the included ice scoop to fill beverage glasses
Drain plug remove to easily drain water from the unit when not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars640 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
